HeroSection.subtitle: "Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work"
HeroSection.author: Aristotle

Deporturnos.name: Deporturnos
Deporturnos.description: Platform for the comprehensive management of sports courts.
Deporturnos.about:
Deporturnos is a web application that simplifies court reservations in sports centers with an intuitive design.
Its backend, developed from scratch, ensures secure and reliable performance.
Additionally, it provides a complete solution for reservation management, user administration, and more.

ProductManager.name: Product Manager App
ProductManager.description: RESTful API designed to handle full CRUD operations for products.
ProductManager.about: This application is a comprehensive tool for product management, designed to be scalable and easy to use. Includes JWT authentication, file uploads, Swagger documentation, automated tests, and EJS views.

Poui.name: Poui
Poui.description: Website designed for an entrepreneur dedicated to selling scented candles and diffusers.
Poui.about:
The site offers a warm and elegant experience that reflects the essence of the business, with a design focused on highlighting the quality and variety of products related to aromatherapy and well-being.
It includes an interactive catalog, contact form, and an 'About Us' section.

TaskList.name: TaskList
TaskList.description: A simple task list that will help you a lot.
TaskList.about: This is a simple task list that uses React Router for navigation and stores data in localStorage.

AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.d0: Hi, I'm Joaquín Darío Olivero, a Full Stack Developer passionate about building robust and scalable solutions.
AboutSection.d1: My main focus is on backend, where I specialize in designing and implementing high-performance REST APIs. Through projects like Deporturnos, my university thesis, I learned to lead the design, development, and deployment of platforms end-to-end.
AboutSection.d2: While my strength is backend, I also have experience with frontend technologies (HTML, CSS, React.js), which allows me to deliver complete end-to-end solutions and collaborate effectively with multidisciplinary teams.

SkillsSection.title: Recently used technologies
SkillsSection.defaultDescription: Hover over a skill to see more details!
SkillsSection.Java: Robust, object-oriented language for building scalable backend systems and enterprise applications.
SkillsSection.Docker: Packages apps in secure containers for easy, consistent deployment.
SkillsSection.SpringBoot: Java-based framework for building production-ready, scalable backend applications with minimal setup.
SkillsSection.PostgreSQL: Open-source relational database with powerful SQL, ACID compliance, and extensibility.
SkillsSection.MongoDB: NoSQL document database designed for flexibility, scalability, and performance.
SkillsSection.NextJS: React framework for server-side rendering and static site generation.
SkillsSection.TypeScript: Typed superset of JavaScript that scales.
SkillsSection.React: Tool for building fast, dynamic web apps (like this one!).
